price: “Waan Rabbiin nuuf barreesse malee homaa nu hin mudatu. Inni tiksaa keenya” jedhi, Mu’uminoonni Rabbuma (qofa) irratti haa hirkatan.
arabic: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَآ إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَنَا هُوَ مَوۡلَىٰنَاۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul lan yuṣībanā illā mā kataba al-lahu lanā huwa mawlānā waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
